title: GhJSON Extension: gh.ironpython (v1.0)
description: Extension for IronPython Script component state

showStandardOutput.description: Whether to show standard output parameter (default: true)

marshGuids.description: Avoid Marshalling Output Guids - set to false to disable (default: true)

marshOutputs.description: Avoid Grafting Output Lines - set to false to disable (default: true)

marshInputs.description: Marshalling inputs option - set to false to disable (default: true)

outModifiers.description: Modifiers for the 'out' standard output parameter
